 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּל‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִיל‎</span>] **verb** ==whirl, dance, writhe== (Late Hebrew, Aramaic ***id., dance***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***change, turn***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—îlu***</u></abbr>, ***writhe*** in fear [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 191</sup> (on <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—***</u></abbr> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZK i. 357</sup>); on form of Hebrew **verb** see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG. 1883, 536</sup>) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָ֫לָה‎</span> [[Mic.1.12|Mic 1:12]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחָלָה֫‎</span> consecutive [[Hos.11.6|Hos 11:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַלְתִּי‎</span> [[Isa.23.4|Isa 23:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָ֫לוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.3|Jer 5:3]] (but see below), [[Lam.4.6|Lam 4:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחָלוּ֫‎</span> [[Deut.2.25|Deut 2:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַ֫לְנוּ‎</span> [[Isa.26.18|Isa 26:18]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחוּל‎</span> [[Jer.23.19|Jer 23:19]]; [[Jer.30.23|Jer 30:23]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּחוּל‎</span> [[Ezek.30.16|Ezek 30:16]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תחיל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּחֹ֑ל‎</span> [[Jer.51.29|Jer 51:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אחולה‎</span> [[Jer.4.19|Jer 4:19]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺחִילָה‎</span>, Hiph\`il <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יחל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחֻ֫לוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.3.29|2Sam 3:29]] but also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחִיל‎</span> [[Ps.55.5|Ps 55:5]] ([[Job.20.21|Job 20:21]] see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חול‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫חֶל‎</span> [[1Sam.31.3|1Sam 31:3]] = [[1Chr.10.3|1Chr 10:3]] + [[Gen.8.10|Gen 8:10]] (where read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּיָּ֫חֶל‎</span> as v[[Gen.8.12|Gen 8:12]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְיַחֵל‎</span> [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּחִיל‎</span> [[Isa.26.17|Isa 26:17]] + 2 t. + [[Ezek.30.16|Ezek 30:16]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (compare ***above***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּ֑חֶל‎</span> [[Ps.97.4|Ps 97:4]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחִלִין‎</span> [[Isa.45.10|Isa 45:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָחִילוּ‎</span> [[Ps.77.17|Ps 77:17]]+ 3 t. ([[Ps.10.5|Ps 10:5]] see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חול‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּחִ֫ילוּ‎</span> [[Judg.3.25|Judg 3:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְחִילוּן‎</span> [[Isa.13.8|Isa 13:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּחִ֫ילוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.22|Jer 5:22]] ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּ֫לִי‎</span> [[Mic.4.10|Mic 4:10]]; [[Ps.114.7|Ps 114:7]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִילוּ‎</span> [[Ps.96.9|Ps 96:9]]; [[1Chr.16.30|1Chr 16:30]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(לָ)חוּל‎</span> [[Judg.21.21|Judg 21:21]]; [[Ezek.30.16|Ezek 30:16]] ( = Infinitive absolute); ***Participle*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺלָה‎</span> [[Jer.4.31|Jer 4:31]] see [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] and [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72»§ 72</sup> R. 1; — 

**1.** ***dance*** [[Judg.21.21|Judg 21:21]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָחוּל בַּמְּחֹלוֺת‎</span>). 

**2.** ***twist, writhe:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** in pain, especially childbirth [[Isa.26.17|Isa 26:17]]; [[Isa.45.10|Isa 45:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהתֿח‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מהתֿוליד‎</span>; metaphor, of sea [[Isa.23.4|Isa 23:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ילד‎</span>); Israel [[Isa.26.18|Isa 26:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חרה‎</span>), [[Isa.54.1|Isa 54:1]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ילד‎</span>); Zion [[Isa.66.7|Isa 66:7]]; [[Isa.66.8|Isa 66:8]] (\|\| ***id.***), [[Mic.4.10|Mic 4:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֹּ֫חִי‎</span>, simile <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כיולדה‎</span>; compare see 9), [[Jer.4.31|Jer 4:31]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** figurative, ***be in severe pain***, or ***anguish*** (mostly in poetry and elevated prose), followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מפני‎</span> [[Deut.2.25|Deut 2:25]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגז‎</span>, compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּחַד‎</span> and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְאָה‎</span> v<sup>a</sup>); [[Ezek.30.16|Ezek 30:16]]; [[Ps.96.9|Ps 96:9]]; [[Jer.5.22|Jer 5:22]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירא‎</span>); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלִּפְנֵי‎</span> [[1Chr.16.30|1Chr 16:30]]; [[Ps.114.7|Ps 114:7]] absolute [[Ps.55.5|Ps 55:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אימות מָוֶת נפלו עלי‎</span>), [[Jer.4.19|Jer 4:19]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], [[Ps.77.17|Ps 77:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגז‎</span>) [[Ps.97.4|Ps 97:4]]; [[Isa.13.8|Isa 13:8]]; [[Isa.23.5|Isa 23:5]]; [[Jer.51.29|Jer 51:29]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעַשׁ‎</span>), [[Joel.2.6|Joel 2:6]]; [[Zech.9.5|Zech 9:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירא‎</span>), probably also [[1Sam.31.3|1Sam 31:3]] (compare [[1Sam.28.5|1Sam 28:5]]) = [[1Chr.10.3|1Chr 10:3]], compare [[BDB#Öt|Öttli]]; figurative of mountains [[Hab.3.10|Hab 3:10]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** in contrition [[Jer.5.3|Jer 5:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָ֫לוּ‎</span> derived from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חול‎</span> [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]; &lt; [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Ra|Ra]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] and others from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חלה‎</span> (wrongly accented; see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חלה‎</span> **Qal 2**). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** in anxious longing <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד בּוֺשׁ‎</span> [[Judg.3.25|Judg 3:25]], followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Mic.1.12|Mic 1:12]] (on [[Gen.8.10|Gen 8:10]], compare above) 

**3.** ***whirl, whirl about*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלרֿאֹשׁ יוֺאָב‎</span> (i.e. blood — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דמים‎</span> — of Abner, from sword) [[2Sam.3.29|2Sam 3:29]] of attack of sword itself [[Hos.11.6|Hos 11:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּלָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אכל‎</span>), compare [[Lam.4.6|Lam 4:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לא חָ֫לוּ בה ידים‎</span>; of tempest <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על ראשׁ רשׁעים יחול‎</span> [[Jer.23.19|Jer 23:19]] (v:a <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סער‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְחוֺלֵל‎</span>) = [[Jer.30.23|Jer 30:23]] (v:a <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַעַר מִתְגּוֺרֵר‎</span>). **Po\`lel.** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְחוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Ps.29.9|Ps 29:9]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Prov.25.23|Prov 25:23]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחוֺלֶלְכֶם‎</span> [[Isa.51.2|Isa 51:2]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Job.35.14|Job 35:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּחוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Ps.90.2|Ps 90:2]] ***Infinitive*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹלֵל‎</span> [[Job.39.1|Job 39:1]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Prov.26.10|Prov 26:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחֹלֶלְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.32.18|Deut 32:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחֹלְלֶוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.21.23|Judg 21:23]] — [[1Sam.18.6|1Sam 18:6]]; [[Ps.87.7|Ps 87:7]] see below; on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹלְלָה‎</span> [[Job.26.13|Job 26:13]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חלל‎</span>; — 

**1.** ***dance*** [[Judg.21.23|Judg 21:23]], so perhaps also [[1Sam.18.6|1Sam 18:6]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּחֹלְלוֺת‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹלֲלִים‎</span> participle (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> omitted) [[Ps.87.7|Ps 87:7]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] [[BDB#Pe|Pe]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]; compare **Qal 1**). 

**2.** ***writhe*** in travail ***with, bear, bring forth*** (poetry), of Sarah, mother of Israel, [[Isa.51.2|Isa 51:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבְרָהָם אֲבִיכֶם‎</span>); of hinds [[Job.39.1|Job 39:1]]; [[Ps.29.9|Ps 29:9]] (causative ); figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s producing earth [[Ps.90.2|Ps 90:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֻלָּד֑וּ‎</span>); of his bringing forth Israel (with difficulty, see [[BDB#Di|Di]]) [[Deut.32.18|Deut 32:18]] of north wind bringing forth rain [[Prov.25.23|Prov 25:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַב מְחוֺלֵל כִּ֑ל‎</span> [[Prov.26.10|Prov 26:10]] ***a master produceth everything*** (on transitive see [[BDB#VB|VB]]; [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] and others derive from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חלל‎</span> ***wound***). 

**3.** ***wait anxiously*** (compare **Qal 2 d**), followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Job.35.14|Job 35:14]] (Elihu). **Po\`lal.** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺלָ֑לתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.51.7|Ps 51:7]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺלָ֑לְתָּ‎</span> [[Job.15.7|Job 15:7]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְחוֺלָ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Job.26.5|Job 26:5]] — 

**1.** ***be made to writhe*** [[Job.26.5|Job 26:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽרְפָאִים‎</span>). 

**2.** ***be brought forth*** [[Job.15.7|Job 15:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּוָּלֵד‎</span>), [[Ps.51.7|Ps 51:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יחם‎</span>), metaphor of wisdom [[Prov.8.24|Prov 8:24]]; [[Prov.8.25|Prov 8:25]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחִיל‎</span> [[Ps.29.8|Ps 29:8]] (twice in verse) ***cause to be an anguish***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדְבָּר‎</span>, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>. **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוּחַל‎</span> [[Isa.66.8|Isa 66:8]] ***be born*** (= travailed with, [[BDB#Che|Che]]), subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִוָּלֵד גוי‎</span>). 

**Hithpo\`el 1.** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְחוֺלֵל‎</span> ***whirling*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַעַר מתח‎</span> [[Jer.23.19|Jer 23:19]] ( = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סער מִתְגּוֺרֵר‎</span> [[Jer.30.23|Jer 30:23]]). 

**2.** ***writhing, suffering torture*** [[Job.15.20|Job 15:20]] (of life of wicked). 

**3.** ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְחוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Ps.37.7|Ps 37:7]] ***wait longingly*** followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> ***for***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דּוֺם‎</span>. **Hithpalpel** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּתְחַלְחַל‎</span> [[Esth.4.4|Esth 4:4]] ***and she writhed*** in anxiety. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חול‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִיל‎</span>] **verb** ==be firm, strong== (Aramaic Pa\`el ***strengthen***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵילָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strength***; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רב חילא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבא‎</span> ***general-in-chief*** [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>No. 28</sup> and others; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֿיל‎</span> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>91</sup> (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֿל‎</span> in Sabean: proper name see [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>JAS Juin, 1872, 533</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be strong***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strength, army***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strong***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—â(i)ltu***</u></abbr>, ***army*** Flood Tabl.<sup>iii. 22</sup> (<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—aiialtu***</u></abbr> Jäger<sup>BAS i. 461</sup>); possibly compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***horses*** (as ***strong ones***? compare [[Ps.33.17|Ps 33:17]])) — only **Qal** ***Imperfect*** in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יָחִיל טוּבוֺ‎</span> [[Job.20.21|Job 20:21]] ***his prosperity is not firm*** (does not endure); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחִילוּ דְרָכָוּ֯ בְּכָלעֵֿת‎</span> [[Ps.10.5|Ps 10:5]] ***his ways are always firm*** (stable, prosperous), so [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Pe|Pe]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] and others
